title: Fix hardcoded 'main' in conflict resolution instructions
description: In internal/worktree/conflict.go:179, ConflictInfo() hardcodes 'git checkout main' in user instructions. Should use the actual target branch (ParentBranch or main). Users get wrong instructions when parent branch isn't main.
closed_reason: Added TargetBranch field to ConflictState, updated HandleConflict to accept target branch param, and modified ConflictInfo to use dynamic target branch instead of hardcoded 'main'
